verbose_text: EA stimulation of acupoint Zusanli significantly attenuated the visceral pain response induced by noxious stimulation and inhibited DCN, glial fibrillary acidic protein (GFAP), and OX42 expression, indicating that glial cells (astrocytes and microglia) in the DCN participate in the analgesic process of EA [XREF_BIBR]; the activation time of astrocytes is earlier than that of microglia [XREF_BIBR].
